name: The Digital Marketing Guy
tag_list: atlanta-marketing-agency, atlanta-marketing-services, inbound-marketing, social-media-marketing, search-engine-optimization, facebook-marketing, twitter-marketing, linkedin-marketing, youtube-marketing, content-marketing, content-creation, email-marketing
overview:
The Digital Marketing Guy helps businesses get found by more prospects, and win more business.

Using inbound marketing techniques - content creation, social media, and search engine optimization (SEO) - The Digital Marketing Guy develops strategies for clients that center around:

√ choosing the right type of content to produce √ deciding on the most appropriate social media networks to have a presence on √ using white hat SEO techniques to improve your ranking on search engines

Each strategy is 100% customized to each businesses needs.

Web: www.TheDigitalMarketingGuy.com Call: 404-436-2031 Email: Matthew@TheDigitalMarketingGuy.com
